content.key_points:
**CONCEPT**: Di Huang is used as an oral treatment of diabetes mellitus

**KEY POINTS:**

- Di Huang is usually given orally to clients with diabetes mellitus to decrease blood sugar levels
- Di Huang decreases blood sugar levels

questions.question_text: Which of the following assessment parameters indicates the therapeutic effects of Di Huang?

extraction_metadata.notes: Di Huang content extracted from book page 347 (right side of PDF page 174). No medical images present as confirmed.
extraction_metadata.reference: Herbal Medicine Handbook Philadelphia, Lippincott Williams and Wilkins
